titleStmt.title: The life and gate of Christianitie entreating of the sacrament of baptisme, deuided into five bookes. Contayning the effects, the mater, the forme, the baptiser, and the partie baptised: with the reasons and use of all the auntient rites and ceremonies. ... Composed, gathered, and written by O.A. ...
titleStmt.author: Almond, Oliver.

publicationStmt.publisher: Par Pierre Auroi, au Pelican d'or] With permission,
